name: Nexon Store
description: A full-stack ecommerce platform built with Medusa.js, offering multi-language support, region-specific pricing, and a high-performance storefront. Delivering a seamless shopping experience across global markets.

name: Patricio Salinas personal site
description: A high-performance frontend for Patricio Salinas, a photographer and visual thinker. This project utilizes WordPress as a headless CMS, internationalization support for multiple languages and image optimization techniques

name: Sublimahyca
description: High-performing ecommerce platform meticulously crafted using the Medusa framework, featuring seamless integration capabilities.

name: Carcaj
description: Literature, essays, and poetry. Crafted from the ground up with PHP and Sass.

name: BUC
description: My inaugural website: a custom-built Wordpress theme using Bootstrap tailored for a consulting firm.

name: Pokedex
description: Performant Pokedex utilizing the PokeAPI and Approuter from Next.js.

name: Internet is great
description: Just a meme page, using AWS and Approuter from Next.js.
